definition: batik (color printing on cloth using wax)
white wax from Chinese white wax bug (Ericerus pela)
tastes as if one is chewing wax (idiom)/tasteless/insipid
Chinese ash (Fraxinus chinensis), whose bark, flowers and leaves are used in TCM

sentences.english: Most people think of wax for protecting their car's paint, but Car Care provide paint sealants as well.
sentences.chinese: 大部分人認爲蠟保護油漆，但是密封膠也有此功能。

sentences.english: Wash the instant noodles with warm water first, stir it and pour away the water containing the wax coating。
sentences.chinese: 用溫水沖洗方便麪，攪拌，然後倒掉含有蠟塗層的水。

sentences.english: Its wick trimmers and trays are to be of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 燈臺的蠟剪和蠟花盤也是要精金的。

sentences.english: Its wick trimmers and trays are to be of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 燈臺的蠟剪和蠟花盤也是要精金的。

sentences.english: When I now want to make more wax rear intake crankcases I have some work.
sentences.chinese: 當我現在要多作蠟後方進氣曲軸箱，我有一些工作。

sentences.english: When applied to any surface, carnauba retains these characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 不管應用於哪種表面，棕櫚蠟都保持這種特性。

sentences.english: Wax or foreign bodies blocking the ear canal can cause hearing loss at any age.
sentences.chinese: 蠟或異物阻塞耳道在任何年齡都會造成聽力喪失。

sentences.english: Today, I got fed up with the amount of hair on my feet, so I went to get my foot hair waxed off.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我厭煩了腳上厚厚的汗毛，便去把它用蠟除掉。

sentences.english: On every full moon, the girl would burned incenses and wax candles to worship the moon.
sentences.chinese: 在每滿月，女孩被燒的香火和蠟蠟燭會崇拜月亮。

sentences.english: Some mothers would seal the knot with wax and their ring.
sentences.chinese: 有些母親會使用蠟和戒指將繩釦封死。

sentences.english: The waxworker brought a new waxwork into the room.
sentences.chinese: 蠟製品工人把一個新蠟像搬進了屋。

sentences.english: The wax repels water and, consequently, most contaminants.
sentences.chinese: 蠟可以阻隔水和污染物。

sentences.english: Excellent when sprayed on towel and used to remove crème or paste waxes that have hardened.
sentences.chinese: 當優秀的毛巾，噴上用於去除蠟乳液或貼有硬化。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Vegetable Oil, Gelatin, Glycerin, Yellow Beeswax, Soy Lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 動物油，明膠，甘油，黃蜂蠟，大豆卵磷脂。

sentences.english: Durabrite is a high quality water-based emulsion floor finish.
sentences.chinese: 超固硬光蠟是一種高質量的水性乳液狀地板護理產品。

sentences.english: The candle was guttering in the candlestick.

definition: jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
a saw/to cut with a saw
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
